Key:
Hmm-hmmm. I'm here five minutes earlier than our
planned meeting time. I really want to make a good
impression on our first date.

...The weather is nice. This is a perfect day for a
date. Ah, I can't wait. I wonder what she's going to
wear today.
Hey, Itsuka, is that you? What are you doing here?
Oh, that voice sounds like Tonomachi's.

Hey, are you shopping alone? I can tag along if you
want, Itsuka-kyun.

Your creepy game is still strong. Sorry, but I have
plans with someone. I can't go shopping with you.

Aww, what? You have plans? Ah, so you're going on a
date with someone, huh? Ugh, you womanizer! You're
mankind's enemy!

Don't be like that. I mean, since when is going on a
mere date a crime?

Ugh. A mere date? I guess Mr. Popular is not like us
commoners. How can you go on dates with people
left and right? I'm so jealous, you bastard!
Hey, Tonomachi. You're too loud.

Sorry. But Itsuka, I'm going to warn you as your friend.
Make sure you limit how much of the game you play.
Later.
I know, jeez... Tonomachi's over-exaggerating.
Whoa, seems like she's here. Hey, Yuzuru! Over here!

Arrived. Shido, I'm sorry for the wait... Were you
here long?

No, no, I just got here. I was just a little earlier than
you.

Relief. I'm glad to hear that... What's the matter,
Shido?
Oh, your outfit, Yuzuru... It's adorable. It suits you.

E-Embarrassment. Shido, you're making me blush in
front of everyone. But... thank you. That makes me
happy.

(Hehe. Yuzuru is so innocent and adorable. She must
be nervous to be on our first date.)
Question. Wh-What's the matter, Shido?

Hehe. I was just thinking how adorable you are. Just
enjoying the view.
...Blushing. Gosh, Shido. Let's hurry and go.

(She must have thought I was making fun of her.
Yuzuru blushed and started to walk.)

(Of course Yuzuru knew I wasn't making fun of her.
She happily linked arms with me. She's so cute. I'm
going to be sweet on her all day today.)
Could that be... What's going on?
Shido, what... is the meaning of this?
Crap, Kaguya!
Question. Shido, who's this?

(Th-This isn't good. This is really not good. Who'd
have thought I'd bump into Kaguya while I was out
with Yuzuru?)
K-Kaguya. Listen to me. This is, um...

I-I see. So there's a reason you're rushing to make
excuses. I mean, you guys are so close and she has
her arm around yours... right?
Jealousy. Kaguya"? You sure seem to be addressing

Operator: her in a casual way. Shido, please introduce her to

Key:
Ouch, ouch, ouch! I'll talk, I'll talk, so don't pinch
me! Yuzuru!
Anger. Despite having Yuzuru, you sure are greedy.

I-I see. So her name is Yuzuru, huh? Shido. Of
course you're going to explain. What kind of
whispered intimacies have you had with that woman?

(What is she blabbering about... Now isn't the time to
even be thinking that.)

W-Wait, Kaguya. This is all a misunderstanding.
Ouch, ouch! Y-Yuzuru, not so hard!

(Damn it, how did it end up like this. I was trying so
hard to make sure they didn't bump into each other.)

You can't tell me, huh? So it must be exactly what it
looks like. Shido, despite having me already...
Disdain. You cheated on me with her.

Oh, well, um... I-I guess that's the case? Haha.
Hahahaha.

(Th-This really isn't good. It's dangerous. I need to
get out of this situation somehow.)
Did you hear? He cheated.
What a low-life. Womankind's enemy.
Worth thousands of deaths.
(Ugh. People are starting to gather.)

H-Hey, you two? Why don't we go somewhere else?
Let's talk in a civil manner. Okay?
I'm totally fine doing it here.

Agreed. Yuzuru agrees with that conniving cat. And
besides, all it takes is for you to just break up with
the girl who has it wrong... Hehe.

O-Oh-ho. That is interesting. You're going to be the
one dumped and running home with mascara streaks
all over your face!

Pity. I guess what's unfortunate isn't just your chest
but your head, too.

Hey, you clump of fat. Let go of Shido now and I'll
pretend I didn't hear you.
Request. Shido. Choose right now.

Me or that confused woman. Who are you going to
choose, Shido?!

(C-Crap. There's no way around this. What do I do?
Is there anything I can do? Is there a good way to
avoid this situation...?)

(Oh, Tonomachi! What perfect timing. Notice me!
Over here! Help me, do something!)

(Oh, he noticed. Hm... He's moving his lips and saying
something...)
Die... It... Su... Ka.

(Die... It... su... ka...
Die, Itsuka?!)
(W-Wait, Tonomachi. Don't be like that. Help me!)
(Damn it, he left.)

Shido, what are you looking at? Hurry up and answer
me. If you do, I'll forgive your cheating for today.

Request. Shido, answer me. Tell that back-alley cat to
go home.

What did you say?! Just because your breasts are
big and cute! I don't blame Shido for falling for you.

Envy. You must have mesmerized Shido with your
style and cuteness. I understand, but I won't back
down!
Shido.
(*Grunt*... What do I do. I... I...!)
I love Kaguya.
I love Yuzuru.
I can't choose!
I love Kaguya. So... Sorry, Yuzuru.

...Understood. I'm sad, but if that's who you choose,
I can't do anything about it.
Separation. Shido, this is the end for us. Good-bye...!
Oh, Yuzuru...!
(Yuzuru ran off. Of course I couldn't run after her.)
Kaguya. Um, sorry. I...

It's fine. Shido, I understand. You chose me. That
makes me really happy. But...
Thanks, Kaguya! Hm? But...?

Whether I can forgive your cheating is a different
story!
...Oh, I thought so.

(In the end, maybe there wasn't an option where all
would end well.)
Shido, you idiot! Forget you!
W-Wait, Kaguya!

(That day, I ran after Kaguya and apologized to her
until the sun went down.)
Sorry, Kaguya. But I'm serious about Yuzuru.

...Th-That's so messed up, Shido. So you're saying
you were just playing with me?
W-Well, that's not it...
Repeat. That's not it? Then what is it?
Oh, well, it does mean that, but...
Shido...? So you were playing?

No, I didn't mean I was playing. I was really close to
getting serious, actually...

(The more I talked the worse it got. It was like
quicksand.)
...I'm going home. Good-bye, Shido!
Oh, Kaguya!

(And Kaguya left. Yuzuru remained as she gave me a
look of doubt.)
Reward. I guess I was happy that you chose me.
Yuzuru...

Addendum. However, you seemed to be really close
to being serious with her...
*Grunt* Well, that was just a figure of speech...

Suggestion. Shido. We should end it as of today, too.
I don't want to hear anything you have to say right
now... Good-bye.
Yuzuru! Please, forgive me!

(I guess I'm paying the price for two-timing them. In
one day, I lost two girlfriends.)
Yuzuru～ Please! Forgive me!
I love both of you, so I can't choose!

(I couldn't help but blurt it out! What will the end
result be?!)
Shido, you low-life. I trusted that you'd choose me...

Despicable. You're horrible, Shido... Your half-assed
kindness can still hurt people.
Trash.
That's an insult to trash.
We should create a bracket called Shido Itsuka" next

(So it didn't work. One hell of a comeback. I guess
having both at the same time would have been too
convenient...)
S-Sorry, you two. Please, give me another chance!

Shido, I wanted you to choose me before... But I have
no more chances to give to you.

Agreed. Shido, you couldn't choose. The choice is
everything.

I mean, he shouldn't be two-timing in the first
place.
And he tried to get them both.
Obvious payback.
Good-bye Shido. It's over for us.

Breakup. Shido, let's break up. I can't be with you
anymore.
Wait. Please wait, you guys! Forgive me～!
(My scream resounded through the plaza.)
